articles.title: How to Improve Call Centre Performance
articles.description: One key contact centre problem is that there is a lack of clarity within a team of advisors as to what is expected of them. This can really damage contact centre performance. Think about it. Can someone perform to the standard that is expected of them if they don't know what that standard is?
